<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_script"><sys_ui_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Client-side logic for Angular App.</description><global>false</global><ignore_in_now_experience>false</ignore_in_now_experience><name>x_874495_to_do.angular_app_client_logic</name><script><![CDATA[angular.module('angularapp').controller('AngularAppCtrl', function($scope){
	
	$scope.myVar='';
	$scope.i=0;
	
	$scope.clearTxt = function(){
		$scope.myVar = '';
		$scope.i++;
		alert("The myVar value was cleared " + $scope.i + " times by " + g_user.userName + ".");
	};
});]]></script><script_name>angular_app_client_logic</script_name><sys_class_name>sys_ui_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-09-20 21:32:52</sys_created_on><sys_id>9eeb313d970611101ec43756f053afbe</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_874495_to_do.angular_app_client_logic</sys_name><sys_package display_value="To do" source="x_874495_to_do">85fff24d970a11101ec43756f053af39</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="To do">85fff24d970a11101ec43756f053af39</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_script_9eeb313d970611101ec43756f053afbe</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-09-20 21:39:25</sys_updated_on><ui_type>0</ui_type><use_scoped_format>false</use_scoped_format></sys_ui_script></record_update>
